other_tests.findings: Suggested a demyelinating distal process of the lower limbs.

other_tests.procedure_name: Serum Saturated Very-Long-Chain Fatty Acid Levels Measurement
other_tests.findings: High levels found in the proband, his mother, and oldest sister.
Mutation analysis showed hemizygous stop codon mutation p.Y181X (c.929C[G) in ABCD1 gene, confirming diagnosis of X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy.
